title: Pixel wont start
content: My Pixel has just suddenly start shutting down - turning on - shutting down - turning on -shutting down - turning on - shutting down - turning on ..... It never gets past the initial Google welcome. I hadn't installed any apps or downloaded any large files. I simply pressed the power button to switch the screen off, now it's essentially completely dead.  Pressing the power button does nothing. Any way to fix it?
